title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 14 - Certificate of adoption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 14 - Certificate of adoption

State Regulations
D.R.L. ยง 114 Form 14
(Certificate of Adoption)
12/97
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
CERTIFICATE OF ADOPTION
I,, Clerk of the

Court of County, do hereby certify that I
have inspected the records of this Court and find that: AN ORDER OF ADOPTION was signed on the day
of, 19, by Honorable, Judge of the Court of the County of, granting the
petition of (and), adoptive parent(s) of a child now known and called by the
name of, who was born at, on the day of, 19. This certificate as to the facts recited
herein shall have the same force and effect as a certified copy of an order of
adoption. IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set
my hand and affixed the seal of the

Court of the County of
this day of, 19. ______________
Clerk of the Court
of the County of

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
